title: Simpsons Red Blazer Realty
content:

Hi. Im making a present for my gf's birthday, and I need typography for both 'red blazer realty' and also 'You'll go nuts for lionel's Huts'  
Thanks in advance!  
gonza

comments.content:
The image is a bit rough, but it could be Goudy Heavyface...
